timeline.message:
Small cleanup for IndexFieldData

This drops `IndexComponent` from `IndexFieldData` because it wasn't
doing anything other than forcing us to perform a bunch of ceremony to
build them.

timeline.bodyText: This is the one change that I believe I'm actually making in this PR: it'll use the logger for this class rather than its subclasses when loading ordinals.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to rename this, now that it's no longer an IndexComponent?  Or is that going to be too much churn?
timeline.author: not-napoleon

replies.bodyText: I think it'd be a bunch of churn, yeah.
replies.author: nik9000
